ValidationMessage.name: CasBoTimeSlotStartTimeBiggerEndTime
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Enter a start time that’s earlier than the end time.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if start time is smaller end time.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBoTimeSlotOverlap
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: One or more time slots overlap with the times you entered. Update existing time slots in the Time Slots related list, or create a time slot that doesn’t overlap.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if time slot does not overlap with other time slots.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBoTimeSlotDayOfWeekMandatory
ValidationMessage.comment: Day of Week must be filled.
